medical_history.chief_complaint: The child presents with significant lower limb deformities.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began at birth as the patient was breastfed with normal development noted. The physical examination revealed developmental deformities, including coxa valga, shortened legs, and absence of the patella.
medical_history.past_medical_history: No history of maternal drug ingestion, alcohol, tobacco, illicit drug use, diabetes mellitus, or infections reported. Family history was negative for any congenital abnormalities or limb deficiencies.
medical_history.family_history: Negative for any birth defects or congenital abnormalities.
